'''20w27a''' is the first [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.16.2]], released on July 1, 2020,<ref name="20w27a">{{snap|20w27a|July 1, 2020}}</ref> which adds [[piglin brute]]s and fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Spawn egg]]s'''
* [[File:Piglin Brute Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Piglin brute spawn egg]]

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Piglin Brute.png|32px]] [[Piglin brute]]s'''
* Stronger variants of [[piglin]]s that wield [[golden axe]]s.
* Are always hostile towards [[player]]s, unlike piglins.
* Have {{hp|50}} health.
* Only spawn during world generation in [[bastion remnant]]s.

=== General ===
'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added <code>mushroom_grow_block</code> block tag.<!--It's not plural-->
** Contains mycelium, podzol, and crimson and warped nylium.
** Used to determine which blocks mushrooms can be placed on and which blocks huge mushrooms can grow on, even if the light level is high.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''Brown and red [[mushroom]]s'''
* Can now be placed and grown on both types of [[nylium]].

'''[[Nether Fungus|Crimson and warped fungi]]'''
* Can now be placed on [[mycelium]].
** Still only grow into a [[huge fungus]] on the respective nylium.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Zoglin]]s'''
* Can now be [[leash]]ed.

=== World generation ===
'''[[Bastion remnant]]s'''
* Now spawn piglin brutes on world generation.
** Normal piglins still spawn.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Advancement]]s'''
* Piglin brutes are now used for the "Monster Hunted" advancement and count toward the "Monsters Hunter" advancement.

=== General ===
'''Menu'''
* Dropping [[resource pack]]s into the menu now updates the list of resource packs without needing a reload.
* [[Data pack]]s can now have a <samp>[[pack.png]]</samp> in the root folder, and will display it in the data pack menu.
